summary: Based on the H. P. Lovecraft story of the same name, a folklorist investigates reports of unusual creatures in Vermont only to uncover more than he bargained for
cast: Stephen Blackehart|Autumn Wendel|Annie Abrams|P.J. King|Barry Lynch|Casey Kramer|Zack Gold|Matt Lagan|Andrew Leman|Adrianne Grady|Daniel Kaemon|Conor Timmis|Sean Branney|Portia Backus|John Jabaley|Matt Foyer|Mike Dalager|Joe Sofranko|Lance J. Holt|Don Yanan|David Pavao|Christopher Ball|Ronald L. Johnson|Martin Wateley|Caspar Marsh|Vlad Peters|Anthony Andruss|Andrew Ball|Robert Graziano|Stephen Daly|Paul Ita|Clifford Ball
title: The Whisperer in Darkness
